content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Baihu Li, thank you for your interest in my apartment. I'm glad you're here to discuss the rental price. May I ask what you would like to offer for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to offer 600 Euros per month. This is my maximum offer. I am also willing to negotiate further.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your offer, Baihu Li. While it's certainly a good deal, I must admit that I was hoping for a higher price. However, I am open to negotiating further if we can come to an agreement that meets both our needs. Could you tell me more about your budget and what you're looking for in the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 600 Euros per month. I am looking for a 25 square meter apartment with a bathroom and a kitchen. I don't need any additional amenities.

I understand if the offer is not enough for you, but I would really like to rent this apartment. I am willing to negotiate further, as long as we can come to an agreement that meets both our needs.

I would also like to mention that I am a responsible and dependable student, and I am looking for a good relationship with my landlord.

I would be happy to hear your counter offer.
name: Baihu Li from China

content:
Thank you for your additional information, Baihu Li. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your interest in renting the apartment. Based on your budget and the size of the apartment, I can see why you would be interested.

However, I must admit that I was hoping for a higher price. My current goal is to maximize my gains from renting out the apartment, and I believe that a higher rental price would be more in line with the market value of the apartment.

That being said, I am willing to consider your offer of 600 Euros per month. If we can come to an agreement that meets both our needs, I would be happy to rent out the apartment to you.

Please let me know if there is anything else you would like to discuss or if you have any additional information to share. I look forward to hearing back from you.
name: Heinrich Heine
